00001 #include "Calibration/ZNtupleDumper/interface/readJsonFile.h"
00002 
00003 
00004 
00005 std::map<int, std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > >
00006 readJsonFile(const std::string& inFileName)
00007 {
00008   std::ifstream inFile(inFileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00009   
00010   std::string line;
00011   while(!inFile.eof())
00012     {
00013       std::string buffer;
00014       inFile >> buffer;
00015       line += buffer;
00016     }
00017   
00018   
00019   
00020   // define map with result
00021   std::map<int, std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > > jsonMap;
00022   
00023   
00024   
00025   // loop on Json file
00026   for(std::string::const_iterator it = line.begin(); it < line.end(); ++it)
00027     {
00028       // find run number
00029       if( (*(it) == '"') && (*(it+7) == '"') )   
00030         {
00031           std::string run(it+1, it+7);
00032           //std::cout << "found run " << run << std::endl;
00033           
00034           
00035           
00036           // find lumi sections
00037           std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > lumisections;
00038           for(std::string::const_iterator it2 = it+10; it2 < line.end(); ++it2)
00039             {
00040               if( (*(it2) == ']') && (*(it2-1) == ']') ) break;
00041               if( *(it2) != '[' ) continue;
00042               
00043               std::string::const_iterator it_beg = it2;
00044               std::string::const_iterator it_mid;
00045               std::string::const_iterator it_end;
00046               
00047               for(std::string::const_iterator it3 = it_beg; it3 < line.end(); ++it3)
00048                 {
00049                   if( *(it3) == ',' ) it_mid = it3;
00050                   if( *(it3) == ']' )
00051                     {
00052                       it_end = it3;
00053                       break;
00054                     }
00055                 }
00056               
00057               std::string lumi_beg(it_beg+1, it_mid);
00058               std::string lumi_end(it_mid+1, it_end);
00059               //std::cout << "[" << lumi_beg;
00060               //std::cout << ",";
00061               //std::cout << lumi_end << "]" << std::endl;
00062               
00063               std::pair<int, int> tempLS(atoi(lumi_beg.c_str()), atoi(lumi_end.c_str()));
00064               lumisections.push_back(tempLS);
00065               
00066               it2 = it_end;
00067             }
00068           
00069           
00070           jsonMap[atoi(run.c_str())] = lumisections;
00071         } // find run number
00072       
00073     } // loop on Json file
00074   
00075   
00076   
00077   return jsonMap;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082 bool AcceptEventByRunAndLumiSection(const int& runId, const int& lumiId,
00083                                     std::map<int, std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > >& jsonMap)
00084 {
00085   // select by runId
00086   if( jsonMap.find(runId) == jsonMap.end() ) return false;
00087   
00088   
00089   
00090   // select by lumiId
00091   std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > lumisections = jsonMap[runId];
00092   
00093   int skipEvent = true;
00094   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < lumisections.size(); ++i)
00095     if( (lumiId >= lumisections.at(i).first) &&
00096         (lumiId <= lumisections.at(i).second) )
00097       skipEvent = false;
00098   
00099   if( skipEvent == true ) return false;
00100   
00101   
00102   return true;
00103 }
